name: vhr-marketing-service
description: A Lambda function for the location-based marketing microservice

scripts.test: env MKT_TBL='AdTrackingTable' POI_TBL='MarketingPoiTable' NOTIFICATION_SERVICE='notifyservice' mocha lib/*.spec.js
scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/lib
scripts.build:copy: cp index.js dist/ && cp -r lib/*.js dist/lib
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
